name: Klein Battle
description:
Pick a side and shoot enemy space polygons to make them fight for our side in this messy 75-second bullet hell game. Watch out for enemy fire as you'd join their side if you get hit. 4 strikes and you're out. See if you can try to be on the winning team.

Controls

WASD
MovementLeft Click / Space
Shoot

Credits and Stuff

Made by melonbreadjin

Font : Rob Graves by Kevin Richey

Music: Outer Space Music Pack by Leonardo Paz
